page.title: 06EAST BRIDGFORD HALL
page.content: EAST BRIDGFORD HALL {/////////////////// } The Hall in East Bridgford is owned by Mrs.Waring. It stands on {4 acres} of land but originally there were more.Inside there are {21}rooms including {2}lounges and an old kitchen now a study and a library.The rooms were all {16}feet square until a Dr.Duffey came to live there, and he altered some of the rooms,like the library which was his surgery.Before Dr.Duffey lived there, there was the Hacker family and before that farmers.FRANCIS HACKER signed the death warrent for {Charles 1st}and in {1649}Charles was executed.When { {Charles 2nd }was on the throne, Francis was executed for high treason. There is a copy of the death warrent in the Hall.The Hall is worth{Â£200,000 in money.
